profile.name: Santiago Pastorino
profile.bio: @rust-lang compiler and types team contributo. Working on @rust-lang. @wyeworks co-founder.

analysis.career_trajectory: Started with Python in 2020, pivoted to Rust systems programming in late 2023. Gained experience in various areas such as compiler development, standard library vendor-specific APIs, and language design.

technical_obsessions.evidence: compiler-team: A home for compiler team planning documents, meeting minutes, and other such things.
stdarch: Rust's standard library vendor-specific APIs and run-time feature detection

comment_analytics.communication_style: Supportive mentor, asks deep architectural questions

match_profile.similar_user_traits: A developer who is passionate about compiler development and language design.
conversation_starters: What inspired you to work on the Rust compiler?
How do you approach optimizing the performance of a Rust program?
Can you explain the design decisions behind Rust's standard library?
